title: rpg服务器需要装什么插件
txt_content: 最近想搞一个rpg服，奈何我只搞过工业神秘生存，对rpg服的插件和mod一窍不通，求大神教一教

replies.author: liuyin125
replies.txt_content:
[角色|娱乐]RPGItems-Reloaded —— 经典的RPG插件[1.7.2~1.9.4]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=546850

[娱乐]Citizens——公民自定义NPC插件[1.6.2-1.8.1]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=485600

[信息|角色|综合|其他|娱乐]Sentry—— 强大神奇的自定义NPC扩展! [内附教程][全版本]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=488928

[娱乐][机械][RPG]Mythicmobs————自定义RPG怪物[1.6.4--...
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=474336

推荐几个我在用的，望采纳
